InstallationÂ¶

  1. Clone the git repository

    git clone https://github.com/elchoup/Python-OC-Lettings-FR.git

  2. Go to the directory of the project

    cd Python-OC-Lettings-FR

  3. Enter the Secret keys

    Create a .env file with the SECRET_KEY and the SENTRY_DSN

  4. Install dependencies with pipenv

    pipenv install --deploy

oc_lettings
